description:
A converter designed by video editors. The professional compression tool accessible to all.

Shutter Encoder is one of the best video converter software, it handles images and audio too!
It has been designed by video editors in order to be as accessible and efficient as possible.
Shutter Encoder makes use of FFmpeg to handle its encoding, allowing support for almost every codec you’ve ever heard of, and many more you haven’t.
Don’t just take our word for it though, Avid themselves recommend Shutter Encoder as part of your Media Composer and ProTools ingesting workflow!
- Added "AI photo" upscaling model
- Added "Background remover" function
- Added Korean language thanks to Thomas Bae
- Completely rewrite "Audio transcription" function
- Added "Keep context" checkbox for "Audio transcription" function
- Added "Max. characters" & "Max. lines" for "Audio transcription" function
- Added "Transcribe speech only" checkbox for "Audio transcription" function
- Ability to use video with "Colorize" function
- Ability to choose image codec for upscaling
- Ability to select the instrument for "Audio separation" function
- Improved "Set a timecode" checkbox
- Improved "Stabilize image" checkbox
- Improved "Extract" function with metadata
- Fixed bug with "Extract" function
- Fixed bug with "AV1" function & 'CQ' value
- Fixed various issues
